SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/12.0) FROM space_list
WHERE category=#{category}

SELECT B.*, ROWNUM FROM ( SELECT REGDATE, space_review.space_id as space_id, ratings, content, space_list.poster as poster, space_list.title as title, space_list.price as price FROM space_review,space_list WHERE space_review.space_id = space_list.space_id ORDER BY REGDATE DESC) B WHERE 3 >= ROWNUM

SELECT A.*, ROWNUM FROM (SELECT title, address, poster, price, max_guest, region_code, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SPACE_REVIEW SR WHERE SR.SPACE_ID = SL.SPACE_ID) AS REV_COUNT FROM SPACE_LIST SL WHERE SUBSTR(SL.REGION_CODE, 1, 5) = #{region_code} ORDER BY REV_COUNT DESC ) A WHERE 4 >= ROWNUM
